Methods

GetBindingInstance(Type)

Called by Reqnroll infrastructure when an instance of a binding class is needed.

public object GetBindingInstance(Type bindingType)

Parameters

bindingType Type

The type of the binding class.

Returns

object

The binding class instance

Remarks

The binding classes are the classes with the [Binding] attribute, that might contain step definitions, hooks or step argument transformations. The method is called when any binding method needs to be called.
